title: Failing an EMIT Test Using Spectrum Labs
report: I trusted the Spectrum Labs to be honest and forthright in their advertising.  I spent my hard earned money on the additive product so that I could hopefully keep my job.  I was responsible in keeping up with the formulation ratings and subscribed to their website for current updates.  I followed the directions on the product and adhered to their recommendations.  I lost my job last week.

erowid.citation: Gabbergirl. "Failing an EMIT Test Using Spectrum Labs: experience with Drug Testing (ID 39687)". Erowid.org. Jun 25, 2007. erowid.org/exp/39687
